title: And just to make my more than twitter…
author: lmorchard
html: And, just to make my more-than-twitter-less-than-essay blogging faster, I’m going to try out the P2 theme. This seems right up my alley.
body: And, just to make my more-than-twitter-less-than-essay blogging faster, I’m going to try out the P2 theme. This seems right up my alley.
